name: both sides now hexi cardi
notes:
watch 2 big hexagon motifs magically join to create this fun crochet cardigan. stitched in bernat super value, you'll work in the round and practice changing colors, seaming, double crochet, working in rows, and more! the easy-fit style gives you ample room for maximum comfort. the pattern is offered in a range of sizes for a great fit.

materials 
bernat® super value™ (7 oz/197 g; 440 yds/402 m) 

sizes xs/s, m/l, xl/2/3xl, 4/5xl
contrast a peony pink (53417) 1, 1, 1, 1 ball 
contrast b masala (53806) 1, 1, 1, 1 ball 
contrast c natural (07414) 1, 1, 1, 2 ball(s)
contrast d navy (07711) 1, 1, 2, 2 ball(s) 

measurements
models are wearing size m/l in bernat® super value™
female model has 34" [86 cm] chest and is 5 feet 5" tall.
male model has 38" [96.5 cm] chest and is 6 feet tall.
